author: ffeldhaus
body:
I recognize that for PowerShell Core the `AzureRM.NetCore` Module and not the `AzureRM` Module. Still, I think this is an issue with PowerShell Core which should be solved, PowerShell Core shouldn't crash, instead the error should be catched by PowerShell.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Install-Module -Name AzureRM -Scope CurrentUser
Get-Command -Module AzureRM
CommandType     Name                                               Version    Source
-----------     ----                                               -------    ------
Alias           Add-AzureRmIotHubEHCG                              4.3.1      AzureRM
Alias           Export-AzureAsInstanceLog                          4.3.1      AzureRM  
...
Cmdlet          Update-AzureRmVmssInstance                         4.3.1      AzureRM
Cmdlet          Wait-AzureRmBackupJob                              4.3.1      AzureRM
^[[58;1RFailFast: Access to the path is denied.

   at System.Environment.FailFast(System.String, System.Exception)
   at System.Environment.FailFast(System.String, System.Exception)
   at Microsoft.PowerShell.UnmanagedPSEntry.Start(System.String, System.String[], Int32)
   at Microsoft.PowerShell.ManagedPSEntry.Main(System.String[])
Abort trap: 6
```

Environment data
----------------

```powershell
PS /Users/ffeldhaus/development> $PSVersionTable                                                                                                                                                                                              

Name                           Value                                                                                                                                                                                                         
----                           -----                                                                                                                                                                                                         
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta                                                                                                                                                                                                    
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                                                                                                                                          
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.5                                                                                                                                                                                                 
OS                             Darwin 16.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 16.7.0: Thu Jun 15 17:36:27 PDT 2017; root:xnu-3789.70.16~2/RELEASE_X86_64                                                                                                
Platform                       Unix                                                                                                                                                                                                          
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                                                                                                                       
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                                                                                                           
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                                                                                                                                       
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Agree it shouldn't crash.  Needs investigation.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
Not repro-ing for me.  Following the steps, it enumerating the commands without problem.

```powershell
Name                           Value                                                                                                                                    
----                           -----

OS                             Darwin 16.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 16.7.0: Thu Jun 15 17:36:27 PDT 2017; root:xnu-3789.70.16~2/RELEASE_X86_64

PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}

SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                                                                  
WSManStackVersion              3.0    
```

title: Listing Commands of AzureRM Module crashes PowerShell in Mac OS X
